page.title: 03A Typical Child's Day 1985.
page.content: The normal time to get up on a school day is between 7am and 7.30am.After washing and dressing breakfast is eaten,this consists of cereal,toast or bacon and a drink. After meeting the school taxie walking or cycling ,most children arrive at school by 8.45am ready to start at 9am. Following registration,the two classes get together for a religious assembly.The rest of the morning is taken up with such lessons as Maths, English,Reading or Discussion.The morning is broken by playtime at 10.30 dinners are served at 12 noon.We all enjoy our food!The afternoon is when we are most likely to have art, drama, craft, P.E.and music.At 3.30pm we go home to play,have our tea,do any homework set,and watch T.V.Most children are asleep in bed by 9pm.
